name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send code to ChatGPT from VSCode

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send code to ChatGPT from VSCode.
!! Requires a matching VSCode extension called "Helpful Dev" to work!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to send selected text from Visual Studio Code (VSCode) to ChatGPT with just a few clicks. It's a handy tool for developers who want to interact with ChatGPT without leaving their coding environment.

!!!! Before using this Chrome extension, please ensure that you have the "Helpful Dev" VSCode extension installed. You can find it on the Visual Studio Marketplace or by following the link below !!!!!
https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=helpfuldev.helpfuldev

Features:

Ensure Chrome is open and VSCode Helpful Dev is installed: This extension works best when Chrome is open and the Helpful Dev extension is installed in VSCode.

Send text to ChatGPT from VSCode: Simply select the text in VSCode, right click to open the context menu, and look for the "Send to ChatGPT" option.

Append or Send options: You have the flexibility to either append the selected text to the existing ChatGPT conversation or send it as a new message.

Start enhancing your coding experience with ChatGPT today!

Please note: This extension requires the Helpful Dev VSCode extension to function properly.
